title: Aaron Rodgers, Packers, NBA, Michael Jordan, the hot seat
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers, Packers, NBA, Michael Jordan, the hot seat
description:
Colin discusses why Aaron Rodgers should help Jordan Love, his thoughts on the NBA possibly continuing the season at Disney World, his thoughts on Isiah Thomas' comments on Michael Jordan, and the NFL QBs that are on the hot seat this season. Guests include Danny Kanell, Chris Simms, Reggie Bush, and Aaron Torres.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
